tool_description: Scans backup storage locations to discover and catalog available backup files, collecting metadata about backup types, dates, sizes, and associated database instances.

storage_locations.description: List of backup storage paths or URLs to scan

database_type.description: Type of database system (mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, mongodb)

date_range_start.description: Start date for backup discovery filter

date_range_end.description: End date for backup discovery filter

error_messages: Storage location inaccessible: Ensure storage paths exist and have proper read permissions.
Unsupported database type: Use one of [mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, mongodb].
Invalid date range: Ensure date_range_start is before date_range_end and both are valid ISO 8601 format.
No backups found: No backup files matching criteria found in specified locations.
usage: Provide storage_locations array and database_type. Optionally filter by date range. Tool will scan locations and return catalog of discovered backup files with metadata.

total_backups_found.description: Total number of backup files discovered

backup_files.description: List of discovered backup file paths

backup_dates.description: Creation dates of each backup file

backup_sizes_mb.description: Size of each backup file in megabytes

backup_types.description: Type of each backup (full, incremental, differential)
